# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I'm extending this opportunity to you at an introductory price of $85. This exclusive offer is tailored to appreciate your interest and ensure you experience the full potential of our product. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your life with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer
